name: Sriracha Deviled Eggs
author: Jenny Saunders
summary: I really love Sriracha. I love deviled eggs. Here's a nice way to give a little kick to a classic party favorite!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Sriracha hot chili sauce, or more to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 pinch smoked paprika, or to taste
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan; cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Cut eggs in half lengthwise; place egg yolks in a small bowl
Mash yolks with a fork; stir mayonnaise, Sriracha sauce, dry mustard, and cayenne pepper into yolks until smooth; season with salt
Spoon yolk mixture into a resealable plastic bag; snip off one corner of the bag
Place egg whites cut-side up on a serving platter
Pipe the yolk mixture into egg white halves; sprinkle with smoked paprika
Refrigerate deviled eggs, covered, until ready to serve
